description: Ichigo (strawberry), http://anidb.net/ch3389 [Ringo] (apple) and http://anidb.net/ch3388 [Sango] (coral) are identical triplets who work for the http://anidb.net/ch26331 [Physical Health Department] of Hanaukyou. Because of their questionable imaginations, this usually consists of them attempting various lewd acts on http://anidb.net/ch3381 [Tarou] around and during bedtime, which he nonetheless seems to avoid mostly.
name: Ichigo
